name: unenthusiastically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows little or no enthusiasm: She nibbled the toast unenthusiastically. "I'm sure it will be lovely," she said, unenthusiastically.
More examplesFewer examplesHe supported the war, but he did so unenthusiastically.They'll do their jobs, however unenthusiastically.The work was respectfully but unenthusiastically described as "interesting''. The market reacted unenthusiastically to the deal.
